charges.charge_description: 18 U.S.C. ยง 922(g)(5)  Illegal Alien in Possession of a Firearm(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: Eighteen (18) months as to each count, concurrent. Supervised release for a term of: Two (2) years as to each count, concurrent. Total Special Assessment of $200, $100 for each count.

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is committed to the custody of the Federal Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of: Eighteen (18) months as to each count, concurrent. Supervised release for a term of: Two (2) years as to each count, concurrent. Total Special Assessment of $200, $100 for each count.
